ARABIC: قَالَ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْغِيكُمْ إِلَٰهًا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمْ عَلَى ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Should I seek something other than Allah as a god for you when He has favoured you over all other beings?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do you want me to seek for you," he said, "a god other than God, when He has exalted you over all the nations of the world?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: 'Should I seek any god for you other than Allah although it is He who has exalted you above all?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Should I choose for you a lord other than God who has favored you above all other people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Shall I seek for you a God other than Allah, whereas He has given you superiority above the entire world?” (By sending His message towards you).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Shall I seek for you an ilah (a god) other than Allah, while He has given you superiority over the nations."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: What! shall I seek for you a god other than Allah while He has made you excel (all) created things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'What, shall I seek a god for you other than God, who has preferred you above all beings?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Shall I seek for you a god other than Allah when He hath favoured you above (all) creatures?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Shall I seek a deity for you other than God, while it is He who has exalted you above all peoples?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: shall I seek for you a god other than Allah, whereas He hath preferred you above the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Shall I find you a god other than Allah, while He has graced you over all the nations?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Shall I seek for you a god other than the (true) Allah, when it is Allah Who hath endowed you with gifts above the nations?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Shall I seek for you an Ilahan (a God) other than Allah, while He has given you superiority over the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns of your time)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Should I seek any god for you except Allah? He has exalted you above the nations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Shall I seek for you a god other than God, when He has favored you over all other people?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Is it other than Allah I should desire for you as a god while He has preferred you over the worlds?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:140] He said, ‘Shall I seek other than God as a god for you, to worship (abghīkum, ‘[shall] I seek for you’, is originally abghī lakum), when He has favoured you above all the worlds?’, of your time, in the ways He has mentioned in His sayings?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He) Moses (said: Shall I seek for you a god other than Allah) shall I command you to worship another lord (when He hath favoured you above (all) creatures) of your time, through surrender unto Him?
